name: Cell Defense (Scripts)
description:
This is an entry to : Trijam #62: The 3 hour game jam

I have failed to finish the game in 3 hours! so i decided to polish it more. i added extra 6 hours of work into this.

Controls : 

Hold Mouse to charge Dash. Release to dash away!

Goal :

Gather Health or Growth power ups to increase your cell defense and create a powerful cell structure! You can also bump into viruses to kill them!

What does your structure look like?
